comment: For the solar curious : in our first month with solar panels , which was December in Michigan , where days are short and gray , and with the system turned off for whole days , we still produced % of our energy needs with our panels . Just getting started .
amr:
# ::snt For the solar curious : in our first month with solar panels , which was December in Michigan , where days are short and gray , and with the system turned off for whole days , we still produced % of our energy needs with our panels . Just getting started .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / curious-01
            :ARG1 (s / solar))
      :snt2 (p / produce-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (p2 / percentage-entity
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG2 (n / need-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (e / energy))))
            :ARG2 (p3 / panel
                  :poss w)
            :mod (s2 / still)
            :time (m2 / month
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                        :value 1)
                  :prep-with (p4 / panel
                        :mod (s3 / sun))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :month 12
                        :location (s4 / state
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Michigan"))
                        :time-of (a / and
                              :op1 (s5 / short-07
                                    :ARG1 (d2 / day))
                              :op2 (g / gray-02
                                    :ARG1 d2))
                        :op2 (t / turn-off-08
                              :ARG1 (s6 / system)
                              :duration (d3 / day
                                    :mod (w2 / whole)))))))

comment: Really ? I thought PV solar was a good source of renewable energy where birds are concerned . But that just what I read in an article . Surely the gas and coal plants are better for the environment , right ?
